A

activateFlashlight(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Flashlight
This method will turn on or off the Flashlight during the course of the Game to assist the player in finding the Briefcase and avoiding or killing Ninja.
activateRadar(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Radar
This method will turn on or off the Radar during the course of the Game to assist the player in finding the Briefcase.
